weka.gui.simplecli.AbstractCommand

Package Description
weka.gui.simplecli  

  • Uses of AbstractCommand in weka.gui.simplecli

    Subclasses of AbstractCommand in weka.gui.simplecli 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Capabilities
    Outputs the capabilities of the specified class.
    class  Cls
    Clears the output area.
    class  Echo
    Outputs a message.
    class  Exit
    Closes the Simple CLI window.
    class  Help
    Outputs help for a command or for all.
    class  History
    Prints all issued commands.
    class  Java
    Sets a variable.
    class  Kill
    Kills the running process.
    class  Script
    Executes commands from a script file.
    class  Set
    Sets a variable.
    class  Unset
    Removes a variable.
